uses.title: Uses
uses.description: Software I use, gadgets I love, and other things I recommend.
uses.intro: I get asked a lot about the things I use to build software, stay productive, or buy to fool myself into thinking I'm being productive when I'm really just procrastinating. Here's a big list of all of my favorite stuff.

thankYou.title: Thanks for subscribing
thankYou.description: Thank you for subscribing to my newsletter.
thankYou.intro: I'll send you an email any time I publish a new blog post, release a new project, or have anything interesting to share that I think you'd want to hear about. You can unsubscribe at any time, no hard feelings.
